h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai
content: Once engulfed in flames, the Black Bear Guai will revert to his old tricks of turning into the black wind wisp and charging at you after a small explosion — only this time it will also deal fire damage. Be ready for him to zip back and forth quickly to catch you off guard.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai'.
The content is as follows:
Once engulfed in flames, the Black Bear Guai will revert to his old tricks of turning into the black wind wisp and charging at you after a small explosion — only this time it will also deal fire damage. Be ready for him to zip back and forth quickly to catch you off guard.
